search.label: Design Extraction Iteration Priority
search.text: Design Extraction Iteration Priority Gemini proposed four iteration paths for the design extraction ecosystem: Sonification (ADSR envelopes mapped to interaction models), Live Lens (automated primitives extractor), Entropy metrics (quantifying chaos/vibe), and Permacomputing audit (transfer-size-per-word-of-content). We're sequencing b design-extraction live-lens tooling permacomputing prioritization
